getSelectedItem().Description: Return currently selected item inside a row ViewHolder.

Returns: ItemBridgeAdapter that creates the list of items.
getBridgeAdapter().Description: Gets ItemBridgeAdapter that creates the list of items.

Returns: HorizontalGridView that shows a list of items.
getGridView().Description: Gets HorizontalGridView that shows a list of items.

getSelectedItemViewHolder().Description: Return @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#RowPresenter#ViewHolder_E@ of currently selected item inside a row ViewHolder.

getListRowPresenter().Description: Gets ListRowPresenter that creates this ViewHolder.

Parameters: int: Position of the item in adapter.
getItemViewHolder(int).Description: Gets ViewHolder at a position in adapter. Returns null if the item does not exist or the item is not bound to a view.

getSelectedPosition().Description: Gets selected item position in adapter.
